answers.answer: I have never heard of this connection...doesn't mean it isn't possible, but I haven't heard of it.Hashi's runs in families.

question: My three children and myself have all been diagnosed with hashimoto's and are on synthroid. One of my sons has been diagnosed with type 1 diabetes at the age of 33.  Three years ago , my husband was diagnosed has having asbestosis. Could his having worked with asbestos all those years be the contributing factor in our health problems?
title: Can Hashimoto's Thyroiditis be caused by exposure to asbestos?
